refs.text: A corpus of Gurindji child language interaction. 60 hours. Recorded by Felicity Meakins between 2003–2007 as a part of the Aboriginal Child Language Acquisition project. Recordings and transcripts stored on the Australian Partnership for Advanced Computing server in Canberra. http://www.linguistics.unimelb.edu.au/research/projects/ACLA/index.html.

refs.text: A corpus of adult Gurindji Kriol speech. 30 hours. Recorded by Felicity Meakins between 2007–2009 as a part of the Victoria River District DOBES project (Principal Investigator: Eva Schultze-Berndt) and using ELDP funds. Recordings and transcripts are stored on in the DOBES archive at the MPI in Nijmegen. http://www.mpi.nl/dobes, http://www.hrelp.org/grants/projects/index.php?projid=159.
